## A Workflow in Radiant

Radiant does not support map-making. We need to do it one of the many
many ways available in R directly!

## A Workflow in R

### 1. Animal and Bird Migration

1.  Head off to
    [movebank.org](https://www.movebank.org/cms/movebank-main)
2.  Look at a few species of interest and choose one.
3.  Download the data ( **ESRI Shapefile**)
4.  Import that into R using `sf_read()`
5.  See how you can plot locations, tracks and colour by
    species....based on the data you download.

For tutorial info: <https://movebankworkshopraleighnc.netlify.app/>
